summary: The untold stories of female jazz and big band instrumentalists and their journeys from the late 1930's to the present day.
cast: Geri Allen|Jessie Bailey|Jane Ira Bloom|Clora Bryant|Terri Lyne Carrington|Anat Cohen|Roz Cron|Peggy Gilbert|Herbie Hancock|Ina Ray Hutton|Laurence C. Jones|Tammy L. Kernodle|Sherrie Maricle|Marian McPartland|James Briggs Murray|Peter O'Brien|Carline Ray|Vi Redd|Janelle Reichman|Billie Rogers|Patrice Rushen|Maria Schneider|Hazel Scott|Viola Smith|Esperanza Spalding|Billy Taylor|Jerrie Thill|Hiromi Uehara|Nedra Wheeler|Mary Lou Williams|Anna Mae Winburn|Willie Mae Wong|Helen Woods
title: The Girls in the Band
